ing: 7 fluid ounces sweetened cream of coconut (such as Coco LopezÂ®)
2 1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers white rum (such as BacardiÂ®)
des: "A yummy frozen mojito with a slight coconut sweetness. Add more cream of coconut for a sweeter drink. Add more rum for a stronger one! Enjoy!"
ins: Blend the ice, limes, cream of coconut, rum, and mint leaves together in a blender until smooth. Pour into two glasses and garnish each with a mint sprig and lime wedge as desired.
